job description:
A Fortune 100 Athletic Apparel and Footwear Company located in Beaverton, OR is looking for a Infosec Data & Reporting Analyst to join the team.

This is a 6 month temporary role and a great way to get your foot in the door at this AMAZING company !

As a Data & Reporting Analyst, your role on the GRC (Governance, Risk and Compliance) team will include leveraging your skillset to deliver high-quality executive-level reports as well as
performing ad-hoc administrative duties, managing timelines for projects, and facilitating meetings.

Your responsibilities will also include:
 Extracting data from various sources and incorporating into polished, executive-level
presentations
 Supporting ad-hoc requests for information by querying relevant data sources
 Managing the schedules of multiple simultaneous initiatives and ensuring milestones
are met
 Facilitating meetings for the Governance team and coordinating schedules
 Partnering with all GRC, CIS and other technology stakeholders to ensure project
alignment

Requirements
 1-2 years of data analysis experience, preferably within a cybersecurity organization
 Excellent Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Word skills
 Experience with Service-Now and/or Tableau is a plus
 Excellent analytical and problem solving skills
 Excellent collaboration skills – must be eager to work as part of a cohesive team and
work as a partner to other teams within the company locally and global.
 Comfortable working with ambiguity is a must
 Exceptional communication skills, including the ability to gather relevant data and
information, actively listen, dialogue freely, verbalize ideas effectively, negotiate tense
situations successfully, and manage and resolve conflict
 Experience working successfully in a highly matrixed work environment.
